summary: This is an email forwarded by Mark Epstein on September 22, 2021, containing observations about photos of a noose related to 'JE2' (likely Jeffrey Epstein). The email describes the noose as clean, hemmed, not cut, with no creases indicating it was tied to anything, and no stains from skin secretions.

persons.name: Mark Epstein

persons.name: Stacey Richman
persons.context: Stacey Richman was the recipient of the email from Mark Epstein discussing the noose photos.

events.title: Email regarding noose photos
events.description: Mark Epstein sends an email to Stacey Richman containing observations about photos of a noose related to 'JE2', describing it as clean, hemmed, not cut, with no creases from being tied and no skin secretion stains.

keyFacts: An email from Mark Epstein dated September 22, 2021, discusses photographic evidence of a noose related to 'JE2' (Jeffrey Epstein).
The email describes the noose as having a hemmed edge, not being cut, showing no creases that would indicate it was tied to anything, and having no stains from skin secretions.
The email was sent to attorney Stacey Richman, suggesting legal consultation or information sharing regarding the evidence.
